thread.title: Appeals court will not put Trump travel ban case on hold
thread.title_full: Appeals court will not put Trump travel ban case on hold

title: Appeals court will not put Trump travel ban case on hold
text:
2:17pm EST Appeals court will not put Trump travel ban case on hold People gather to protest against President Donald Trump's travel ban in New York City, U.S., February 1, 2017. REUTERS/Brendan McDermid 
SAN FRANCISCO A U.S. appeals court on Monday rejected a request from the U.S.   to place on hold an appeal over President Donald Trump's travel ban from seven majority-Muslim countries. 
The 9th U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals had suspended Trump's travel ban earlier this month while litigation over the measure proceeds. Trump has said a new executive order will be coming soon, and the Justice Department in a court filing asked the 9th Circuit to put litigation on hold, pending the new executive order. 
(Reporting by Dan Levine; Editing by Jonathan Oatis)
